Class ShadowContextWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowContextWrapper
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ShadowApplication, ShadowContextThemeWrapper, ShadowService

public class ShadowContextWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

        Delegates to the application to return the next Intent to stop a service (irrespective of if the service was running)

        Returns:
        Intent for the next service requested to be stopped
